title: What can you learn about vandalism at school? - Quora

response.answer_text: I guess you can learn that lots of people want to vandalize n graffiti the school, they just are waiting for someone to do it first. Once I wrote “hi” on a desk, and the next day, people in the classes before me had already wrote on it. Someone wrote on it in pen. so I responded in sharpie and soon after a week or 2 the desk was a graffitied desk. there was a fully colored anime girl and everything. since this was next to the wall, I also vandalized the wall a bit, and people followed me. So most people aren’t as good as you think!
Some vandals are there just to watch the world burn. Due to internal problems they will destroy property and make other people's lives more difficult as a method of coping with one’s own problems.
